title: Wiki-Based Collaborative Learning: Practical Projects for Training Language Experts

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Wiki Editing Skills and Advanced Expertise in Language Education
context.additional_context: Aimed at strengthening collaborative content development capabilities for corporate language education managers/leaders, using personal devices (BYOD) to provide flexible learning environments applicable to real work contexts.

learning_goals: Learners can collaboratively create language education practice guide documents in teams using a wiki platform
Learners can evaluate team members' contribution levels and collaboration patterns through wiki edit history analysis
Learners can improve content quality by performing at least three feedback cycles (iterations) during the project period
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
